title: Lithium nitrate salt-assisted CO2 absorption for the formation of corrosion barrier layer on AZ91D magnesium alloy
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,17696-17709
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02829E, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Gyoung G. Jang, Jiheon Jun, Jong K. Keum, Yi-Feng Su, Mayur Pole, Sridhar Niverty, Vineet V. Joshi
The formation of Mg–Li–C–O barrier layer on AZ91D Mg alloy using LiNO3-assisted thermal CO2 treatment provides a pathway to utilize excessive CO2 for corrosion protection of AZ91D.
